name: The Gold Collection
overview: A compilation of six successful games by US Gold, spread across 2 cassettes. The games in this compilation are: Tape 1, side A: Beach-Head Tape 1, side B: Zaxxon Tape 1, side B: Blue Max Tape 2, side A: Tapper Tape 2, side B: Buck Rogers: Planet of Zoom Tape 2, side B: Spy Hunter
